1.title: Kevin Bacon Wears a Blue Button Down Shirt and Brown Boots
1.plot: "Weird Al" Yankovic joins the Comedy Bang. Bang. team, while Kevin Bacon talks about city planning. When Scott finds a pot of gold, he's harassed by a mythical creature.

2.title: The Lonely Island Wear Dark Pants and Eyeglasses
2.plot: The Lonely Island shows off their new merchandise and Gil Faizon & George St. Geegland talk about their upcoming Broadway Show.

3.title: Tony Hale Wears a Blue Flannel Shirt and Fuchsia Sneakers
3.plot: Tony Hale throws out the first Comedy Bang! Bang! pitch. Scott forgets the meaning of friendship when he decides to play mean pranks on his crew. Plus, a preview for Scott's new game show "You Made Your Bed, Now Lie In it."

4.title: Tegan and Sara Wear Leather Jackets and Skinny Jeans
4.plot: Tegan and Sara stop by to dish on their songwriting process, while Scott notices there's something off about the new intern Raymond. Meanwhile, an unexpected visitor gives the home audience acting tips.

5.title: T-Pain Wears Shredded Jeans and a Printed Shirt
5.plot: T-Pain, Scott, and "Weird Al" write a new single, while Melvin Alberts discusses his alien abduction. Scott makes a scientific breakthrough so he can get more things done. Then Al shows of his new culinary TV show.

6.title: Aubrey Plaza Wears a Velvet Off-the-Shoulder Gown with Flowers in Her Hair
6.plot: Aubrey Plaza tries to seduce Scott, while "Weird Al" and Scott are transported to a different time period by a mysterious stranger. Meanwhile, a dashing adventurer recounts his sexual exploits.

7.title: Joe Jonas Wears a Maroon and Gold Letterman Jacket with White Sneakers
7.plot: Joe Jonas shows off his curious cellphone replacement, while Scott hosts a memorial for his old friend. Maxwell Keeper discusses his place of employment, and we get a sneak peek of Scott's new movie.

8.title: Nathan Fielder Wears a Blue and Grey Flannel and Jeans
8.plot: Nathan Fielder stops by the Comedy studio and Scott and "Weird Al" try to get him to freak out. Meanwhile, ice cream entrepreneurs Len & Barry ask Scott to help them come up with a new Comedy Bang! Bang! flavor.

9.title: Kristen Schaal Wears Strawberry Colored Pants and a Multicolored Shirt
9.plot: Kristen Schaal shows off her real voice; Paul Rust presents his New No-Nos. It's time for "Weird Al" Yankovic's birthday, but one member of his family isn't very happy about it.

10.title: Zach Galifianakis Wears Rolled Khakis and Shoes with Brown Laces
10.plot: Zach Galifianakis, "Weird Al" Yankovic, and the Comedy Bang! Bang! gang look back on their favorite memories of Scott.

11.title: Kaley Cuoco Wears a Black Blazer and Slip on Sneakers
11.plot: The Comedy Bang! Bang! Crew is visited by some American heroes to try to bring the country back to its moral foundations. Kaley Cuoco stops by and finalizes her will, and lifestyle Coach Karen helps Scott style his inside.

12.title: Gillian Jacobs Wears a Gray Checkered Suit and a Red Bow Tie
12.plot: The Comedy Bang! Bang! studio prepares for a calm Halloween, but unbeknownst to Scott and the crew, they are being haunted by a ghoulish spirit. Gillian Jacobs stops by and gets a free cocktail, and Scott shows off his latest film role.

13.title: Scott Aukerman Wears a Tailored Black Suit
13.plot: When Scott leaves the show for a new opportunity, Jason Mantzoukas takes over as special substitute host. His first guest? Celebrity Scott Aukerman. Also, legendary soul singer Donny Gary stops by the couch.

14.title: Krysten Ritter Wears a Turtleneck and Black Boots
14.plot: Scott and Weird Al throw a party that goes a little overboard. Krysten Ritter visits and plays her favorite party game, and author Gail Summercat gives tips to women in the workplace.

15.title: Allison Janney Wears a Chambray Western Shirt and Suede Fringe Boots
15.plot: "Weird Al" and the gang cope with the death of a friend, and Allison Janney visits the Comedy Bang Bang set to chat and play a fun game.

16.title: Ben Folds Wears a Black Button Down and Jeans
16.plot: Scott's estranged family visits, and Ben Folds drops by to talk about his new start-up business. Plus, "Weird Al" Yankovic shows his new sports documentary, and world-traveler Martin Moreland joins on the couch.

17.title: Malin Akerman Wears a Black Blouse and Cropped Jeans
17.plot: Malin Akerman visits the Comedy Bang! Bang! set and reveals all her deep dark secrets. Meanwhile, Slow Joey tries to juggle his new business venture with falling in love.

18.title: Mike Colter Wears a Pink Button Up and Black Boots
18.plot: Scott is excited to spend Thanksgiving celebrating with the Comedy Bang! Bang! crew, but will a group of outsiders disrupt his plans? Also, Mike Colter discloses a shocking revelation, and teacher Joe Bongo discusses his extra-curricular activities.

19.title: Reggie Watts Wears a Purple and Yellow Quilted Sweatshirt
19.plot: Reggie Watts returns to the show just in time to try to prevent a disaster from striking its participants. Meanwhile, Al has a surprising announcement, and Adam Scott drops by to give Scott some assistance.

20.title: Lord Andrew Lloyd Webber Wears a Purple Top Hat & Fabrice Fabrice Wears One Pink Fur Leg Warmer
20.plot: Scott receives some disturbing news that may mean the end of Comedy Bang! Bang! forever. But before the end, old chums Lord Andrew Lloyd Webber and Fabrice Fabrice stop by to wish the gang goodbye.

1.title: Zach Galifianakis Wears a Blue Jacket & Red Socks
1.plot: Host Scott Aukerman and guest Zach Galifianakis discuss Zach's place in the pantheon of comic actors, and also talking dogs.

2.title: Amy Poehler Wears a Black Jacket & Grey Pants
2.plot: Host Scott Aukerman confronts guest Amy Poehler about her hair, and her feud with Mad Magazine.

3.title: Jon Hamm Wears a Light Blue Shirt & Silver Watch
3.plot: Host Scott Aukerman allows a film student to direct his interview with guest Jon Hamm.

4.title: Michael Cera Wears a Blue Denim Shirt & Red Pants
4.plot: Host Scott Aukerman and guest Michael Cera discuss Michael's disappointment about not getting cast in the part of his dreams.

5.title: Seth Rogen Wears a Plaid Shirt & Brown Pants
5.plot: Host Scott Aukerman interviews Seth Rogen about his recent vacation.

6.title: Paul Rudd Wears a Red Lumberjack Flannel Shirt
6.plot: Host Scott Aukerman welcomes guest Paul Rudd, and discovers they both have a love of mime.

7.title: Ed Helms Wears a Grey Shirt & Brown Boots
7.plot: Host Scott Aukerman invites guest Ed Helms to display his banjo prowess and make animal noises.

8.title: Elizabeth Banks Wears a Red Dress
8.plot: Scott's dad writes a few jokes for the opening monologue, then Scott introduces a game and cheerful Elizabeth Banks. A TV critic, Gordon Thatchet, pays a call, spouting impromptu lacerating remarks, and Barry R., a smooth jazz saxophonist, talks and plays. Reggie Watts provides musical accompaniment and the side-kick's color commentary.

9.title: Adam Scott Wears a Red Oxford Shirt & Jeans
9.plot: Scott Aukerman welcomes television star Adam Scott to discuss his workout regimen, but they are interrupted by a surprise visit from a Magic Window.

10.title: Weird Al Yankovic Wears a Hawaiian Shirt
10.plot: Host Scott Aukerman welcomes guest "Weird Al" Yankovic, who smashes all musical conventions.

1.title: Andy Samberg Wears a Plaid Shirt & Glasses
1.plot: We find out what Scott and Reggie have been up to since last season and Reggie enters a cybernetic computer world. Scott interviews Andy Samberg.

2.title: Aziz Ansari Wears a Charcoal Blazer
2.plot: An elite team is dispatched inside Scott to cure his cold while he interviews Aziz Ansari and craft services coordinator Fabrice Fabrice (Nick Kroll).

3.title: Anna Kendrick Wears a Patterned Blouse & Burgundy Pants
3.plot: Scott and Reggie preview their new movie and special guest Anna Kendrick time travels. Guest: Ben Schwartz.

4.title: David Cross Wears a Red Polo Shirt & Brown Shoes with Red Laces
4.plot: Host Scott Aukerman and musical cohort, Reggie Watts with guest stars David Cross and Will Forte.

5.title: Zoe Saldana Wears a Tan Blouse & Glasses
5.plot: Host Scott Aukerman and musical cohort, Reggie Watts with guest stars Zoe Saldana and Paul F. Tompkins.

6.title: Gillian Jacobs Wears a Red Dress with Sail Boats
6.plot: Host Scott Aukerman and musical cohort, Reggie Watts with guest stars Gillian Jacobs and Jason Mantzoukas.

7.title: Andy Richter Wears a Suit Jacket & a Baby Blue Button Down Shirt
7.plot: Host Scott Aukerman and musical cohort, Reggie Watts visit the big apple. Special guest stars Andy Richter and Mike Hanford.

8.title: Sarah Silverman Wears a Black Dress with a White Collar
8.plot: Scott gets tongue-tied during his interview with Sarah Silverman. Also starring Reggie Watts and Joe Lo Truglio. Special Guest: Adam DeVine.

9.title: Bill Hader Wears a Grey Button Down Shirt & Sneakers
9.plot: Host Scott Aukerman and musical cohort Reggie Watts with guest stars Bill Hader and Bobby Moynihan.

10.title: Casey Wilson Wears a White Lace Dress & a Black Blazer
10.plot: Host Scott Aukerman and cohort Reggie Watts prepare for a musical extravaganza. Guest stars Casey Wilson and Paul F. Tompkins and Thomas Lennon.

11.title: Rainn Wilson Wears a Short Sleeved Plaid Shirt & Colorful Sneakers
11.plot: Rainn answers a 4 million part question & listens to true cowboy stories. Reggie has a new superpower plus there's a taxidermy contest!

12.title: Pee Wee Herman Wears a Halloween Costume
12.plot: Pee-wee casts spells and saves Scott's life for Halloween at Comedy Bang! Bang! Plus, Reggie has a surprise costume of his own.

13.title: Jessica Alba Wears a Jacket with Patent Leather Pumps
13.plot: Jessica takes the reins and hosts a game show of her own and we learn about her childhood. Scott travels the country helping women with their sweater woes. Plus, there's a visit from the King of Cards.

14.title: Rashida Jones Wears a Black Blazer & Flowered Pants
14.plot: Rashida eats a bug! Monster truck driver Darryl Drummond announces his retirement. If this episode doesn't end on time, there are dire consequences. Plus, Scott helps a scorned spouse get closure.

15.title: Jim Gaffigan Wears a Blue Jacket & Plum T-Shirt
15.plot: Jim Gaffigan eyes a new invention. PLUS an episode of The Birthday Boys, IFC's new sketch comedy show.

16.title: Andy Dick Wears a Black Suit Jacket & Skinny Tie
16.plot: Scott explores the endless possibilities that one missed bus can make while Andy & Reggie split realities. A mysterious stranger has advice for Scott. Plus, Scott's mechanic reveals underground comedy.

17.title: Clark Gregg Wears a Navy Blazer & White Collared Shirt
17.plot: Scott issues a warning to down and out celebrities, Clark gives us props and we find out about a controversial new holiday for naughty little boys. Plus, Reggie chases love.

18.title: Jason Schwartzman Wears a Striped Shirt & High Top Sneakers
18.plot: It's bring your kids to work day on the CBB set. Jason makes a baby and helps Scott parent. Plus, discover the answer to the season's most pressing question.

19.title: Cobie Smulders Wears a Black & White Strapless Dress
19.plot: Cobie visits CBB for the lost "pilot" episode. Visit the show's origins and discover the many changes in its long tenure. Plus, a master magician plays havoc with the set!

20.title: Zach Galifianakis Wears a Santa Suit
20.plot: It's a Christmas Miracle until Zach pisses off an elf. Scott learns the meaning of Christmas when the bonuses get lost. Plus, we meet Scott's mom.

1.title: Patton Oswalt Wears a Black Blazer & Dress Shoes
1.plot: Patton Oswalt and Scott compete for the same acting role, while a turtle expert is going through an emotional breakdown. We find out Reggie's real name and witness what unsuspecting bystanders do with an unprotected laptop!

2.title: Craig Robinson Wears a Bordeaux Button Down & Dark Jeans
2.plot: Craig Robinson has a saucy question on his mind. Reggie gets taken up to space to battle an alien race while, back on Earth, Scott helps renovate homes. Plus, a comedy team is hiding a deadly secret!

3.title: Jenna Fischer Wears a Floral Blouse & Black Heels
3.plot: There's a murder in the studio! An inspector (Jason Alexander) narrows down the suspects while Jenna Fischer shares a clip from her appearances on the British version of Comedy Bang! Bang!

4.title: Fred Armisen Wears Black Jeans & Glasses
4.plot: Fred Armisen and Scott are up for the same late night talk show hosting gig. Who will land the job? Reggie's ultimate fantasy is revealed, and we find out what that means for Scott.

5.title: Zach Galifianakis Wears a One-Armed Jacket
5.plot: In this very special episode, we flash forward to the final episode of CBB. Zach Galifianakis makes his first appearance since his big accident and characters from past seasons come back to say goodbye.

6.title: Nick Offerman Wears a Green Flannel Shirt & Brown Boots
6.plot: A major disaster forces Scott and Reggie to conserve air in hopes of a last-minute rescue. Nick Offerman transfixes Scott with his mustache, while a mysterious woman (Kate McKinnon) gives tips on how to be a friendly neighbor.

7.title: Lizzy Caplan Wears All Black & Powder Blue Espadrilles
7.plot: In this special countdown episode, Scott and Reggie share their favorite moments in Comedy Bang! Bang! history. Lizzy Caplan has an important question on her mind. A seedy photographer takes us through his process.

8.title: Tony Hawk Wears a Plaid Shirt & a Silver Watch
8.plot: CBB gets a new boss - he's stubborn, rude, and only 7 years old! Tony Hawk gives a couple of lunkhead crew members some good advice, while everyone else waits for a big superstar to arrive.

9.title: Alison Brie Wears a Black Mesh Top & Mini-Skirt
9.plot: Comedy Bang! Bang! gets a talk show makeover, and we learn about Reggie's favorite baseball team. Alison Brie reveals the secrets of her acting process, while a German film director tells of his plans to make another film.

10.title: Josh Groban Wears a Suit & Striped Socks
10.plot: When we find out Reggie's Dad had a shot at the big time, Scott goes back to the 1960's to try and change history! Meanwhile, Josh Groban gives Scott some constructive criticism and a plate spinning novelty act is hiding a game-changing secret.

11.title: Ellie Kemper Wears a Purple Ruffled Sleeveless Top & Lavender Flats
11.plot: Scott has a shot with the guest of his dreams, Ellie Kemper, but will he blow his chance to make a good impression? Jesse Ventura might have an important announcement.

12.title: Steven Yeun Wears Rolled Up Black Jeans & No Socks
12.plot: Steven Yeun reveals how he will prepare in the event of a real zombie apocalypse. Community activist Victor Ramos stops by to talk about some interesting programs he's heading.

13.title: Wayne Coyne Wears a Halloween Costume
13.plot: The cryptkeeper's brother, the bookkeeper, introduces 4 Tales Of 'Terror' as The Flaming Lips' Wayne Coyne joins Scott on the couch.

14.title: Dane Cook Wears a Black Blazer & Tailored Pants
14.plot: Dane Cook sits on the couch next to the cast from one of the most critically acclaimed television series ever. Scott debuts a brand-new character, and we see what Reggie is up to when he's not the bandleader.

15.title: Chris Hardwick Wears a Black Polo & Weathered Boots
15.plot: Chris Hardwick joins Scott and meets the new, spunky CBB secretary, working her way up the ranks. Reggie stars in a brand new commercial. Plus, there's a visit from the aspiring Honorary Mayor of Hollywood.

16.title: Amber Tamblyn Wears a Leather Jacket & Black Booties
16.plot: Reggie prepares Thanksgiving dinner for friends.

17.title: Kevin Smith Wears a Hockey Jersey & Jean Shorts
17.plot: It's Scott's birthday and Kevin Smith drops by to help him celebrate. Reggie tries to pull out all the stops to make it an episode Scott will never forget. A snooty college student gives new meaning to 'charity work'.

18.title: Rob Corddry Wears Tan Dress Shoes & Red Socks
18.plot: Rob Corddry sits down with Scott as we say goodbye to one of the most adored cast members of Comedy Bang! Bang! Meanwhile, a poet drops by the studio to share his latest works.

19.title: Eric Andre Wears a Cat Collage Shirt & Sneakers
19.plot: Can Scott pull off the perfect episode? Scott and Reggie take advantage of a scientist's new invention to do just that and go down a rabbit hole that could change everything.

20.title: The Lonely Island Wear Holiday Sweaters & White Pants
20.plot: When the hottest toy on the market is in short supply, people go to drastic measures. Luckily, The Lonely Island is here to get everyone in the Christmas spirit.

1.title: Ty Burrell Wears a Chambray Shirt & Clear Frame Glasses
1.plot: Ty Burrell shows Scott what the world looks like through his eyes, and craft services coordinator Fabrice Fabrice performs spoken word poetry. Meanwhile, Scott premieres a clip of his exciting new detective drama.

2.title: Maya Rudolph Wears a Black Skirt & Strappy Sandals
2.plot: Maya Rudolph plays "Skirmish of the Sexes". Agent Aukerman has gone undercover to apprehend notorious bank robber Reggie Watts. Also, businesswoman Claire Coulter stops by.

3.title: Schoolboy Q Wears a Patterned Bucket Hat & Glasses
3.plot: Aaron Neville explains his anti-violence campaign. Reggie is caught in a war between two warring musical combos vying for his attention. Meanwhile, Scott interviews rapper Schoolboy Q about what it's like to be "Man of the Year".

4.title: Eddie George Wears a Navy Suit and Half-Zip Pullover
4.plot: Eddie George reveals the secret behind his greatest plays, and NFL Commissioner Wendell Gazell explains the changes he's making to the game.

5.title: Simon Helberg Wears a Sky Blue Button Down Jeans
5.plot: Simon Helberg has to prove he's not an android, and author Shiloh Huffington schemes his way onto the couch. Scott and Reggie get whipped into shape by a cruel drill sergeant, and are tasked with a dangerous mission of their own.

6.title: Mark Duplass Wears a Striped Sweater and Jeans
6.plot: Scott has a shoot-out with guest Mark Duplass, and etiquette expert Miss Polite dispenses advice. Scott must help Reggie land the girl of his dreams.

7.title: Kid Cudi Wears a Denim Shirt and Red Sneakers
7.plot: Rapper Kid Cudi drops by to give Scott a lesson in the art of the prank phone call, and 6-year-old film critic Aiden Tomasetto shares his favorite movies.

8.title: Jesse Tyler Ferguson Wears a Brown Checked Shirt and Stripey Socks
8.plot: Jesse Tyler Ferguson explains the great chemistry behind 'Modern Family', and cyborg rights activist Nelz Hebber has some ideas for the future.

9.title: Dax Shepard Wears a Heather Grey Shirt and Black Blazer
9.plot: Dax Shepard demonstrates the difference between comedic and dramatic acting, and professional gift guesser Bertram Jollymore shows off his talents on the couch. Meanwhile, to deal with rising rent costs, Scott and Reggie find a new roommate.

10.title: Zach Galifianakis Wears Grey Corduroys and Brown Leather Shoes
10.plot: It's a drowsy day in the studio as the cast and crew keep dozing off. Zach Galifianakis naps on the couch, and Reggie dreams of making music with Tears for Fears. Will Scott find the key to keeping everyone awake?

11.title: Joseph Gordon-Levitt Wears a Heart T-Shirt and Blue Jeans
11.plot: Scott discovers his true feelings for his producer; Joseph Gordon-Levitt gives Reggie a reason to join his production company; shock jock Ronnie "Brew Dude'' Haynes discusses the true definition of Taco Tuesday.

12.title: Jack Black Wears an Embroidered Cowboy Shirt and Ox Blood Sneakers
12.plot: Scott and Reggie try to spend their stunt budget, leading to Comedy Bang Bang's most action-packed episode ever. Jack Black decides whether to play a famous song on the show and vigilante J.W. Stillwater talks fan boats, gators, and justice.

13.title: Joel McHale Wears a Navy Zip-up and High Tops
13.plot: Joel McHale talks about his unusual birth, and a Hollywood actor dishes on his recent firing. Meanwhile, Scott's new machine is running the show. Will a warning from the future be enough to help Scott save the show?

14.title: Lil Jon Wears a Baseball Cap and Sunglasses
14.plot: Rapper Lil Jon shares his retirement plans, and spokesperson Shandy Williams gives Scott a gift from her new hair extension line. Meanwhile, the Quizzler is running loose in the studio and it's up to Scott and Reggie to solve his quizzles!

15.title: Colin Hanks Wears a Denim Button Down and Black Sneakers
15.plot: A physicist takes Scott, Reggie, and the crew aboard his spaceship, but danger soon arises. Will Scott be able to interview Colin Hanks and celebrity stylist Trey Booth, or will the perils of space get to them first?

16.title: Skylar Astin Wears Blue Jeans and Weathered Brown Desert Boots
16.plot: Scott is in danger of losing his job if he can't pass his big test, so he enlists a tutor for help. Meanwhile, Skylar Astin reveals his real age and Easy Listening DJ Forsythia reads dedications from her listeners.

17.title: Michael Sheen Wears a Plaid Button Down and Grey Blazer
17.plot: Michael Sheen teaches Scott about the birds and the bees, and entertainer Victor Diamond explains his various medical conditions. Meanwhile, Scott receives accolades for saving Wonky Cat, the world's weirdest cat.

18.title: Thomas Middleditch Wears an Enigmatic Sweatshirt and Sweatpants with Pockets
18.plot: Scott's secret identity is at risk when his friends win the Comedy Bang! Bang! "Interview a Fan" contest. Meanwhile, Thomas Middleditch proves he's an expert at accent work, and shaman Harmony Moongloss leads the group in a guided meditation.

19.title: Karen Gillan Wears a Black and White Striped Pullover and Coral Skirt
19.plot: Karen Gillan spills movie secrets, and small business owner George Groiny-Melendez reveals his less than savory profession. Meanwhile, Scott is torn between his new writers and the comedy of yesteryear.

20.title: Judd Apatow Wears a Polo and Blue Suede Shoes
20.plot: Scott receives a visit from a reporter writing about the fate of Reggie Watts. Scott remembers their last episode together, with guest Judd Apatow and a special appearance from Scott's daughters.

21.title: Michael Cera Wears a Yellow Collared Shirt and White Sneakers
21.plot: When Scott is assigned Kid Cudi as his new partner the two of them must settle their differences and learn to work together. Michael Cera shows off his business cards, and August Lindt shares his recommendations for vacation destinations.

22.title: James Marsden Wears Gray Pants and Black High-Top Sneakers
22.plot: When a wizard appears on-set, Scott agrees to help save his realm if they can perform in a magic show together. James Marsden acts with a real rabbit and discusses his good looks and Mr. Celebrity shares Hollywood gossip.

23.title: Brie Larson Wears a Billowy Long-Sleeve Shirt and White Saddle Shoes
23.plot: The Comedy Bang! Bang! crew takes off for summer vacation, leaving Scott and Kid Cudi to finish the season with a ragtag crew of misfits.

24.title: Carly Rae Jepsen Wears a Chunky Necklace and Black Ankle Boots
24.plot: Scott fires security guard Zeke and hires someone new to protect the show's belongings. Carly Rae Jepsen premieres a new song, and amusement park owner Tim Duncan explains his scariest ride, the Samurai Scream.

25.title: Mary Elizabeth Winstead Wears an A-Line Skirt and Pointy Black Boots
25.plot: Scott and Kid Cudi try to catch a rat in the studio before their annual health inspection. Meanwhile, Mary Elizabeth Winstead celebrates her birthday and inventor Ahmad Rashad al-Zarqawi shows us his new gadget.

26.title: Tom Lennon Wears Black Slacks and a Black Skinny Tie
26.plot: After Scott's editors threaten to go on strike, Scott decides to do the show all in ONE TAKE- no editing needed. Meanwhile, Tom Lennon shows how messy he can get and a famous Broadway director shares songs from his classic show.

27.title: Ken Marino Wears a Slim Gray Suit and Salmon Tie
27.plot: Scott signs a deal with the devil to get Ken Marino on the couch. A famous Icelandic singer stops in to sing her country's new national anthem.

28.title: Randall Park Wears Brown Dress Shoes with Blue Socks
28.plot: Scott wants to wear an unusual hat to accept an award, and his staff doesn't have the heart to argue. Meanwhile, Randall Park plays "Title These Tunes" and Richard Bunn demonstrates how he has written 140 novels with the "Bunn Process."

29.title: A$AP Rocky Wears a Black Button Up Jacket and Black Sneakers
29.plot: Scott's possessions come to life and go on a journey to reunite with him. A$AP Rocky visits and shows off his awards, and Scott premieres the trailer of his new sports movie.

30.title: Weird Al Yankovic Wears a Different Hawaiian Shirt
30.plot: Comedy Bang! Bang! tries to appeal to a female audience by hiring three co-hosts, but Cudi suspects something's not right. Weird Al plays a game of "Celebrity Weird Al Do's" while Cudi enlists the help of paranormal professionals.

31.title: Uzo Aduba Wears a White Blouse and Royal Blue Heels
31.plot: Uzo Aduba's comic skills are on display; concerned citizen Tim Landers describes his plan to get back at some kids; Scott and Cudi from the future take a time machine back to the present to prevent the total destruction of comedy.

32.title: Judy Greer Wears a Navy Blouse and Strappy Sandals
32.plot: Judy Greer shows off her universal audition and the gang looks forward to an appearance by Tom Hanks. Meanwhile, Kid Cudi is revealed to be a former hockey star, his rival shows up at the CBB studio to challenge him to a rematch.

33.title: Stephen Merchant Wears a Checkered Shirt and Rolled Up Jeans
33.plot: Stephen Merchant dishes about his rock collection, and martial artist Dave Grigsby shows off his karate skills. Scott finds out a surprising secret about his parentage and has to go through a series of challenges against some formidable foes.

34.title: Robert Kirkman Wears a Tan Blazer and Red Suit Pants
34.plot: Robert Kirkman shares his greatest fears. Scott and his crew get real spooky for Halloween as the Comedy Bang! Bang! set turns into a haunted house visited by some stranded strangers.

35.title: David Krumholtz Wears a Blue Zip-Up Jacket and Grey Sneakers
35.plot: David Krumholtz reviews Scott's hosting abilities, while Arthur Steinborn teaches the gang his memory technique. Scott and Cudi are visited by an avant-garde painter who wants to give the show a more artistic spin.

36.title: Michelle Monaghan Wears a Burnt Orange Dress and White Heels
36.plot: Michelle Monaghan shows off her hog-wrestling skills, and Alan Thicke performs personalized theme songs for the gang. After Scott suddenly gets rich, he's visited by his long-lost brother Billy.

37.title: Jake Johnson Wears a Light Blue Button-Up Shirt and Brown Shoes
37.plot: Jake Johnson shares some dating tips and Scott debuts his new game show. The Comedy Bang! Bang! Studio is flipped upside down, and the gang must do the show hanging from the ceiling.

38.title: Adam Pally Wears a Navy Blazer and Bright Blue Sneakers
38.plot: Adam Pally visits and talks about his holiday plans, and Scott premieres his new dating show. Kid Cudi introduces his new character, who becomes an instant celebrity.

39.title: Kathryn Hahn Wears Ripped Jeans and Black Heels
39.plot: Kathryn Hahn stops by and swears like a sailor. John Lennon comes back from the dead and Scott teaches the skills you need to host a talk show.

40.title: Josh Groban Wears a Blue Blazer and Shiny Black Shoes
40.plot: It's Christmas at Comedy Bang! Bang!, but global warming has turned the set into a beach. Josh Groban shows off his singing chops, and Scott falls in love.

imdb.title: Comedy Bang! Bang!
plot: A talk show parody that features celebrity guests, comedy sketches and animation. Based on the podcast of the same name.::Anonymous

camera: Sony PMW-F3, Cooke S4 and Angenieux Optimo Lenses
